sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It's Monday, the 20th of June. Good morning, Europe. A very warm welcome to the program.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Let's bring you up to date with our top stories.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: A major blow for President Macron as his party loses its absolute majority in the French National Assembly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: But the left and far right make significant gains.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: President Zelensky says he expects Russia to intensify its attacks on Ukraine and warns that other European nations could be next.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: And on World Refugee Day, the United Nations calls on leaders to make peace and provide humane solutions to the crises that have left 100 million people displaced. East.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: French President Emmanuel Macron has suffered a major election defeat losing his absolute majority in Parliament.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The recently re-elected president now faces uncertainty over how to strike alliances in order to push through key legislation this summer.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Although his centrist ensemble coalition won the most seats, a newly formed alliance of the left, far left and green parties called NUP has come second, with Marine Le Pen's far right party making major gains to come in third.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Prime Minister Elizabeth Borne said the situation was unprecedented. Never before has the National Assembly seen such a configuration under the Fifth Republic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The situation poses a risk for our country in view of the challenges we face both nationally and internationally.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: As of tomorrow, we will start working on building an action-oriented majority.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Far-left leader Jean-Luc Mélenchon, who successfully brought mainstream parties into his broad-based alliance, said the presidential party had suffered a total rout.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: It's at the end, and before anything else, it's a complete failure of the Macroni, a moral failure.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: These are the people who lectured everyone non-stop and said they would be the barrier to the far right.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: And the result?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: They reinforced it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The big surprise was Marine Le Pen's National Rally Party, which hiked up their eight seats to more than 80.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The significance wasn't lost on Le Pen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: We have achieved our objectives of making Emmanuel Macron a minority president in order to protect the country from the reign of a single party without control and the exercise of power.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: A further disappointment was the turnout 53% didn't bother to vote either in protest or indifference.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Undoubtedly the biggest winner of the night is Marine Le Pen's national rally

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: with 89 seats up from eight back in 2017. Now Marine Le Pen's movement gets to form a parliamentary group for the first time since the 1980s, securing more voice and more weight in the political debate here in France within and beyond the walls of France's National Assembly. Annelies Borges in Paris for Euronews.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: A historic moment for Colombia as they elected its first left-wing president.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Gustavo Petro, a former guerrilla fighter, narrowly defeated a political outsider, millionaire Rodolfo Hernandez, a second round runoff.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Pedro's election win ushers in a new era for politics in Colombia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Today is undoubtedly a historic day. What is coming is a real change, a fundamental change in which we are committing the very existence life itself.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Petro was once a rebel with the now defunct M19 movement and was granted amnesty after being jailed for his involvement with the group.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: His rival conceded defeat two hours after polls closed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: His rival conceded defeat two hours after polls closed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The election was a tight contest, with just three percentage points separating them.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: I wish Gustavo Petro will know how to lead the country, to be faithful to his speech against corruption, and not to disappoint those who voted for him.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Petro's victory underlines a drastic change in presidential politics in a country which has long marginalized the left for its perceived association with armed conflict.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: NATO's chief has warned Western countries that they must be ready to offer long-term support to Kyiv.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Four months into Russia's war in Ukraine, Jens Stoltenberg told German daily newspaper Bild that the West should be in this for the long haul.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: ''We must prepare for the fact that it could take years, he said.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: We must not let up in supporting Ukraine, even if the costs are high, not only for military support, but also because of rising energy and food prices.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: On Sunday, Ukraine's president and his advisers claimed that Russia is now trying to make Kharkiv in Ukraine's northeast and the country's second largest city a new front line in the war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Within hours, Moscow's Ministry of Defense announced that Russian missiles had struck a Kharkiv tank repair plant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The ministry spokesman also claimed that up to 20 vehicles supplied by the West had been destroyed in the last 10 days.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile Russia's attack on the eastern Donbass region goes on.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Residents in the city of Lysychansk are forced to shelter and live in basements in dire conditions, having to withstand cold temperatures at night while food and water sources are limited. Most of them want to leave, but the constant shelling is making that impossible.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: A 27-year-old from Sheffield has won the US Open.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Matthew Fitzpatrick was pushed all the way by Will Zalatouris and Scotty Scheffler.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: But when it came to the crunch, he produced a moment of genius from a bunker at the 18th.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: He joins Tony Jacklin and 2013's Victor Justin Rose as modern-day English winners of the US Open.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: And winning Fitzpatrick says it meant the world.

sentences.sentence: Max Verstappen has won his first ever Canadian Grand Prix.

sentences.sentence: The Red Bull driver narrowly held off his opponent, Carlos Sainz, in the final laps of the race and claimed his sixth Formula One finish.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Mercedes seven-time world champion Lewis Hamilton secured third place on Sunday in what has been Montreal's first F1 competition in three years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Fina, Swimming's world governing body, has voted to stop transgender athletes from competing in women's elite races if they have gone through any part of the process of male puberty.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Those who have transitioned before the age of 12, in other words before the onset of puberty, will be allowed to compete.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Fina has promised to create an open category for trans women in some events. Thousands of hectares of forest have been consumed by pre-summer wildfires in Spain.
